member.name: P:MMS.Core.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_jsdeliver
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/event.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/supplemental.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/globalize@1.4.2/dist/globalize.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/g [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_local
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/event.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/supplemental.min.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/number.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/date.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/currency.min.js"></s [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper
member.summary: Creates a language-selection navigation menu based on supported cultures

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.CultureKeyName
member.summary: Optional: Route data key name for the culture part, default "culture" Default: cultute

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.SupportedCultures
member.summary:
Optional: Manually specify a comma-separated list of supported cultures
en-US, fa-IR, de, fr

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.LanguageLabel
member.summary: Optional: The part of culture to show as menu items' label. Default: LanguageLabel.EnglishName

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.RedirectTo
member.summary: Optional: Specify the redirect policy for when the language is changed Default value: RedirectTo.SamePage

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.HomePageName
member.summary: Optinal: The URL part after the culture when RedirectTo is HomePage /en/Home/Index

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.ViewContext
member.summary: Current view context

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper.RenderMode
member.summary: Render mode: Classic for an HTML dropdown list, Bootstrap for HTML5 div with Bootstrap4 style (which is the default).

member.name: F:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.Globalization.LanguageNavTagHelper._reqLocOpts
member.summary: required for listing supported cultures
Creates a language navigation menu, depends on supported cultures Uses Property Injection to receive Logger and stuff.

summary.para: Creates an email link with circled check mark if the email is confirmed; otherwise shows an exclamation mark.
Uses Font-Awesome by default; but can be changed.
Indicates whether the email is confirmed or not or it's unknown.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.EmailLinkTagHelper.IconFontBaseClass
member.summary: Icon font's base class. Default is "fas"

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.EmailLinkTagHelper.CheckCssClass
member.summary: Confirmed check mark icon's css class. Default is "fa-check-circle"

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.EmailLinkTagHelper.ExclamationCssClass
member.summary: NOT Confirmed check mark icon's css class. Default is "fa-exclamation"

member.name: M:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.EmailLinkTagHelper.ProcessAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.TagHelperContext,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.TagHelperOutput)
member.summary: process in creating email tag helper

member.name: T:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper
member.summary: Creates a pagination control

member.name: M:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper})
member.summary: Creates a PagingTagHelper and injects Configuration and Logger properties.

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageNo
member.summary:
Current page number
Default: 1
Example: p=1

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSize
member.summary:
Number of records shown on each page
Default: 25
Example: pagesize=25

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.TotalRecords
member.summary:
Total record count
Default: 0

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.MaxDisplayedPages
member.summary:
If the count of pages is more than this attribute, show only this number of pages with numbered buttons and show an ellipsis for other pages.
Default: 10

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.GapSize
member.summary:
Gap size to start show first/last numbered page
Default: 5

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.SettingsJson
member.summary: Name of the paging section in MMS:Paging section inside appSettings.json Default: "default"

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavFormMethod
member.summary:
Form submit method when selecting different page size option
Default: get
Options: get, post

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavBlockSize
member.summary:
The minimum block size to populate all possible page sizes for dropdown list
Default: 25

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavMaxItems
member.summary:
Maximum nmber of items to show in the page size navigation menu
Default: 5

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavOnChange
member.summary:
Action to execute when page size dropdown changes
Default: this.form.submit();

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageNo
member.summary:
Query string paramter name for current page.
Default: p
exmaple: p=1

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageSize
member.summary:
Query string parameter name for page size
Default: s
Example: s=25

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringValue
member.summary:
Query string value starting from the ? including all next query string parameters to consider for next pages links.
Default: string.Empty
@(Request.QueryString.Value)

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowPageSizeNav
member.summary:
Show drop down list for different page size options
Default: false
Options: true, false

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstLast

Show or hide First and Last page buttons
Default: false, but will auto show if total pages > max displayed pages

Show or hide Previous and Next page buttons

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowLastNumberedPage

member.name: P:MMS.Core.TagHelpers.PageControls.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstNumberedPage
